verses.t: And it came to pass after{H310} this, that Absalom{H53} the son{H1121} of David{H1732} had a fair{H3303} sister{H269}, whose name{H8034} was Tamar{H8559}; and Amnon{H550} the son{H1121} of David{H1732} loved{H157} her.

So Tamar{H8559} remained{H3427} desolate{H8074} in her brother{H251} Absalom's{H53} house{H1004}.Amnon: Heb. Aminonregard…: Heb. set not thy heartdesolate: Heb. and desolate
But when king{H4428} David{H1732} heard{H8085} of all these things{H1697}, he was very{H3966} wroth{H2734}.
